item.title: Junior .Net Software Developer
item.description:
Lavante is Hiring!

Lavante Inc. is a fast growing San Jose company combining financial and IT expertise to provide first class on-demand financial services to its clients. Newly funded by blue chip venture capital, it is looking for a junior .Net developer, to help maintain and support data-intensive web applications.

The ideal candidate is a recent university graduate, with one to few years of experience. He or she is an independent self starter, a problem solver, a creative thinker with good communication skills.

The job involves supporting existing applications, data management and reporting. The candidate will be a key member of the software development team, reporting to the VP of engineering.

Expert level expertise is required in:

 ASP.Net 2.0 +
 C#
 SQL Server 2005: database design, complex stored procedures and Reporting Services
 JavaScript
 CSS
 HTML

Other requirements:

 BS in computer science, Engineering or equivalent is required as a minimum.
 Expertise or previous work in the finance industry is preferred, but not required.
 The candidate must be authorized to work in the USA.

Lavante is an EOE and strongly supports diversity in the workplace
item.dc:title: Junior .Net Software Developer
